mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student SET grade = #{grade}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth = #{birth}, addr = #{addr}, etc = #{etc}, pic = #{pic}, eng_name = #{engName}, phone = #{phone}
mapper.select: SELECT s.stu_id AS studentPk, s.name AS name, s.gender AS gender, s.birth AS birth, s.phone AS phone, p.nm AS parentName, p.phone AS parentPhone FROM student s LEFT JOIN parents p ON s.parents_id = p.parents_id LEFT JOIN student_classes sc ON s.stu_id = sc.stu_id LEFT JOIN class c ON sc.class_id = c.class_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.tea_id = t.tea_id WHERE t.tea_id = #{pk} ORDER BY s.name, s.birth

SELECT s.stu_id AS pk, s.name AS name, s.gender AS gender, s.birth AS birth, s.phone AS phone, s.addr AS addr, s.etc AS etc, s.created_at AS createdAt, sc.class_id AS uClass, p.uid AS parentId, p.nm AS parentName, p.connet AS connet, p.phone AS parentPhone, s.pic AS pic, t.nm AS teacherName FROM student s LEFT JOIN parents p ON s.parents_id = p.parents_id LEFT JOIN student_classes sc ON s.stu_id = sc.stu_id LEFT JOIN class c ON sc.class_id = c.class_id LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.tea_id = t.tea_id WHERE s.stu_id = #{pk} LIMIT 1
SELECT pic, name, grade, phone, stu_id AS pk FROM student WHERE state = 1 AND parents_id IS NULL ORDER BY name, grade
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student_classes SET stu_id = #{studentPk}, class_id = #{subNumber}, etc = #{etc}
mapper.select: SELECT stu_id AS pk, parents_id AS parentId, grade, name, gender, birth, pic, addr, phone, etc, eng_name AS engName, created_at AS createdAt, state, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM student WHERE stu_id = #{pk}

SELECT sc.class_id AS uClass, sc.etc AS etc, t.nm AS teacherName FROM student_classes sc JOIN CLASS c ON sc.class_id = c.class_id JOIN teacher t ON c.tea_id = t.tea_id WHERE sc.stu_id = #{pk} ORDER BY uClass
